author: bayard
msg: Beginning a faq on the repository

author: smilek
msg: changed doAction and doRender signatures to match this core.js change: jetspeed.url.retrieveContent (which wraps dojo.io.bind) now takes bindArgs object as first argument (encompassing formObject, mimeType and requestUrl) to enable the use of additional dojo.io.bind arguments (eg. formFilter); most retrieveContent callers have signature changes to match the signature change to retrieveContent or at least have adjustments to the args used to call retrieveContent

author: smilek
msg: jetspeed.url.retrieveContent (which wraps dojo.io.bind) now takes bindArgs object as first argument (encompassing formObject, mimeType and requestUrl) to enable the use of additional dojo.io.bind arguments (eg. formFilter); most retrieveContent callers have signature changes to match the signature change to retrieveContent or at least have adjustments to the args used to call retrieveContent
moved jetspeed.url.retrieveContent methods load and error to new type jetspeed.url.BindArgs and added createIORequest method which creates a dojo.io.Request object from a jetspeed.url.BindArgs object

all render/action form submits are now controlled (ie. intercepted and submitted using dojo.io.bind) via new type jetspeed.om.ActionRenderFormBind, which derives from dojo.io.FormBind. this significantly improves desktop correctness for render/action form submits via script and where image and submit input type values are needed by the server. previous dojo.event.connect to form.onsubmit has been removed.

author: smilek
msg: added desktopColumnClear style class for vertically stacked columns

author: smilek
msg: jetspeed.url.retrieveContent (which wraps dojo.io.bind) now takes bindArgs object as first argument (encompassing formObject, mimeType and requestUrl) to enable the use of additional dojo.io.bind arguments (eg. formFilter); most retrieveContent callers have signature changes to match the signature change to retrieveContent or at least have adjustments to the args used to call retrieveContent
added detection for columns stacked vertically (previously column detection was horizontal only - side-by-side) to PortletWindowDragMoveObject.onDragMove
